source: Stops enemy attacks and makes them flee.
Steals life energy from human targets.
Mana essence (2 fire nettles, 1 meadow knotweed)
Mana elixir (2 Fire Roots, 1 Meadow Knotweed)
Mana potion (3 Mana Essences, 1 Meadow Knotweed)
Essence of healing (2 Healing Plants, 1 Woodland Berry)
Extract of healing (2 Healing Herbs, 1 Blue Plant)
Elixir of Life (1 Healing Root, 1 King's Sorrel, 1 Meadow Knotweed)
Elixier of Spirit (1 Fire Root, 1 King's Sorrel, Meadow Knotweed)
Potion of Dexterity (1 Goblin Berry, 1 King's Sorrel, Meadow Knotweed)
Potion of strength (1 Dragonroot, 1 King's Sorrel, Meadow Knotweed)
Spells cost 35% mana less to cast.

Spells cost 40% mana less to cast.
Spells cost 45% mana less to cast.
To brew any healing potions or potions to strengthen magic power, you need a proper mixture of plants:
healing plants and fire plants, combined with Forest Berry for small and Blue Elder for medium potions.
Stronger potions call for Meadow Knotweed.
To brew any potions that effect permanent changes to the body or spirit, you need two plants:
Brewing these recipes is the highest art of alchemy. They all have the use of king's sorrel and meadow knotweed as an ingredients in common.
